help-file.title: DIABOLIS
help-file.content:
The Diabolis Necromancer is a master of assembling and leading the most deadly of undead armies. They can exhume corpses from the ground to be used at their disposal. The Reaper also has the chance to "Mummify", or embalm, a corpse if they score the killing blow.
Skills --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 31st level: Exhume
Spells --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 9th circle: Create Golem
Innate --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Mummify
